wikipedia_page.main: Air Chief Marshal Sir John Alexander Carlisle Aiken,  (22 December 1921 – 31 May 2005) was a senior Royal Air Force (RAF) officer, and the Commander of British forces in Cyprus at the time of the Turkish invasion of the island in 1974.
